Name

Crit Effect

Type
Bell Ringer The target is sickened 2, and it is stupefied 2 until it is no longer sickened.

Bludgeoning
Skewered Triple damage. The target is slowed 1 for 1 round.

Piercing
Momentum You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Slashing
Petrified The target is petrified for 10 minutes.

Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #7
